title: Change Date and Time formatts on event materials

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Change the time and date formats on the event materials. Currently uses M / D / Y while in AUS and NZ D / M / Y is much more common. Changing the time zone from PT to AEST would also make it clearer for people on the OCE server to know when the materials will expire.

replies.body: Correction. Only order tokens do. Because % most riven mains come from NA.
